entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:40 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:40 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
